name: The Astrolarix: Complete Soundtrack
detailed_description:
Here is the Sountrack of the game, this is a gift for those people who bought the game in their month of release, thanks to them, I hope it is to their liking.

The Soundtrack contains the following musical Files:

1. Annoying.wav
2. Brave.wav
3. Cautiously.wav
4. Contemplative.wav
5. Danger Ahead.wav
6. Data.wav
7. Ending.wav
8. Exploring.wav
9. Fear.wav
10. Gentle Survivor.wav
11. Kokobot.wav
12. Mysterious.wav
13. Oponent.wav
14. Relief.wav
15. Slow Suspense.wav
16. Solution.wav
17. Temporal Dispair.wav
18. Tension.wav
19. Thinking.wav
20. Waiting.wav

All of the files are in the WAV format.

Composing music is a job, the fact that this DLC is free does not imply the devaluation of it, it is a gift for the players; this is something I usually do as a "thank you" after the first month of sales in a video game, please don't dismiss the work that comes with being a composer.

Thanks again and Enjoy!

short_description: Here you can find the Music of the Astrolarix, all of the tracks are in the wav format audio for the best quality.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Able to play WAV files
